backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report containing an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing components, hooks, utilities, and styles used in the sports shop app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining extensive OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and global border/background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx and sets the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing navigation, cart state, product filtering, reactions, hero image selection, and order flow.
frontend/src/components/AddProductDialog: Dialog component for adding new products with form validation, image URL handling, and toast-based success feedback.
frontend/src/components/CartView.tsx: Cart display component showing cart items with quantity controls, removal actions, subtotal calculation, and empty state messaging.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutView.tsx: Checkout form component collecting shipping and payment details, validating inputs, calculating subtotal, and submitting mock orders.
frontend/src/components/FavoritesView.ts: Displays a grid of favorited products with options to view details or remove favorites, and shows an empty state when none exist.
frontend/src/components/OrderConfirmatio: Shows an order confirmation page with order ID, purchased items, subtotal calculation, and a button to continue shopping.
frontend/src/components/OrderHistoryView: Renders a list of past orders with item details and dates, including an empty state when no orders are available.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetails.t: Displays detailed product information with an image gallery, liking/favoriting, sharing, and add‑to‑cart actions, with fallbacks for missing products or images.
frontend/src/components/ProductImageLigh: Provides a fullscreen lightbox for navigating product images with keyboard support and overlay controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx: Shows a filterable product grid with search and price filters, plus actions for viewing details, liking, favoriting, sharing, and adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/components/SportsShopHeader: Header component showing logo, navigation buttons, and cart/favorites counts.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines Product interface and a seeded list of sports products with images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroImagePreferenc: Stores and retrieves the user's selected hero image option from localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/clear functions, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductReactions.t: Manages like and favorite reactions for products using localStorage.
Handles user-added products, persisting them and merging with seeded products.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/orders.ts: Builds and sends an order creation request to the backend using cart and customer data.
frontend/src/lib/productShare.ts: Generates shareable product links and uses Web Share API or clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, animations, and includes typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, feature list, and notes for the Sports Shop app including requirements, versions, and architectural updates.
